title: Cant login
body:
Hello everyone, anybody know why we cant login to LOL? it says "Authenticating...", if you enter wrong password it says wrong password but if correctly entered its just saying Authenticating... nothing else. I restarted client and computer, looks like problem with your server I believe?

Here is screenshot: [(https://puu.sh/sn59a/cf6923eb50.jpg)]

replies.body: There were some server issues last night on OCE, that have since been resolved.  Be sure to bookmark the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#oce) page to stay up to date on any live issues.  Everything should be okay now!
i got the same issuse.     changed  different  computer   still got same problem.
My housemate and I are also having the same problem. I can't log in the beta client, my housemate was able to log in via the legacy client but everything seems to be timing out.
yeah, i'm having the same issue. was in a game, but after my game finished, my client was not responded. i re-open the client and was unable to log in and says "authenticating"
